mapper.select: SELECT id,funcName,funcKey,isAtom,isOpen,moduleId,pid,dataStatus from sys_function a WHERE a.id IN( SELECT funcId FROM t_b_role_function WHERE roleId IN( SELECT a.roleId FROM t_b_emp_role a LEFT JOIN t_b_role b ON b.id=a.roleId WHERE a.empId = #{empId} AND b.dataStatus = 1)) AND a.isOpen = 1 AND a.dataStatus = 1
